DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to assess whether the behavior, anxiety, and dental pain of pediatric patients during dental treatment improves when a video game is played as method of distraction.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of PlayStation Distraction in the Dental Setting
DOC.detailed_description: global behavior Parental perception of patients' anxiety Patient's anxiety dental pain Heart Rate
DOC.criteria: Patients aged 68 years. Patients who required a minimum of 2 visits for restorative treatment. Patients with reduced audiovisual capabilities. Patients with psychological disorders.
